mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St. John the Baptist, a negro man named MANUEL, he says he belongs to Mr. Jacob Morris, engineer on board the Laurell Hill. This negro is aged about 30 years. The owner thereof is requested to claim said boys according to law. St John the Baptist, may 13th 1855. NUMA TREPAGNIER. Deputy Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
